panels.description: The average time between a block's issuance and acceptance by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Average Block Acceptance Latency

panels.description: The average time between a block's issuance and rejection by this node over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: Average Block Rejection Latency

panels.description: Percentage of queries for which we receive chits on time.
panels.title: Percentage of Successful Queries

panels.description:
Measures how much of each second is being spent handling different kinds of messages on the P-Chain.
The value for chits, for example, is the number of seconds spent handling chits messages per second, over the last 30 seconds.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (Total)

panels.description:
Measures how long each kind of request on the P-Chain takes to handle.
The value for chits, for example, is how long, in seconds, it takes to handle a chits message.
panels.title: Message Handling Time (per Message)

panels.description: The total stake of validators currently "benched" due to poor query responsiveness. Queries to these validators will immediately timeout until they are removed from the "bench."
panels.title: AVAX Benched

panels.description: Measures how many of each kind of message are received per second on the P-Chain.
panels.title: Messages Received per Second
Incoming Messages Expired in Last Minute
